Cloud Engineer

SALARY

Annually:

110,000 - 130,000

REFERENCE NUMBER

SB472

POSITION TITLE

Junior Cloud Engineer

Who you will report to

Senior Cloud Engineer

Mr. Gary Cheeseburger


IT Department, Cubicle C3301, 2nd Floor

Description

A cloud engineer is a key component of an organization's cloud-based system, because they create and maintains the cloud systems. They are extremely important in cloud computing platforms. Furthermore, cloud engineers help store company data and efficiently back them up.

Our company is looking for some Junior Cloud Engineers to join our ever-growing team and work with our IT and Engineering department to troubleshoot, maintain, optimize our organization's cloud-based infrastructure. As a cloud engineer, you will work behind the scenes to keep the machine running smoothly.
